RI Bakal Sambangi AS Lagi Bahas Penyelesaian Insentif Dagang
06 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Hendra Kusuma


Menlu Retno LP Marsudi Foto: Andhika Prasetia/detikcom

Jakarta - Pemerintah menyebut bahwa pembahasan mengenai urusan Generalized System of Preferences (GSP) pada perdagangan Indonesia dengan Amerika Serikat (AS) akan rampung pada akhir Desember 2019.Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi mengatakan tim negosiasi GSP Indonesia akan menyambangi AS pada awal Desember tahun ini. Hal ini juga menjadi hasil pertemuan antara Menteri Perdagangan AS Wilbur Ross dengan Presiden Jokowi."Kita bicara juga mengenai masalah fasilitasi GSP, ini kan masalah yang sudah lama dibahas dan tadi sudah ada satu kesepakatan bahwa mungkin awal Desember kita akan mengirim tim untuk negosiasi, untuk menyelesaikan," kata Retno di komplek Istana Kepresidenan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Dalam pertemuan tersebut, Retno menilai bahwa Ross memberikan sinyal bahwa penyelesaian usulan GSP akan rampung dengan menguntungkan kedua belah pihak."Dari apa yang disampaikan oleh Secretary Ross kita optimis bahwa isu yang terkait dengan fasilitas GSP ini akan selesai dengan baik, dengan win win," ujar dia.Sementara itu, Menteri Koordinator Bidang Perekonomian Darmin Nasution mengungkapkan bahwa penyelesaian negosiasi usulan GSP akan terjadi pada saat Natal tahun 2019."GSP tinggal finalisasi item, tinggal kita kirim delegasi kita dan nanti kita akan kirim di bulan Desember, sehingga bisa diselesaikan sebelum christmas," jelas Airlangga.GSP adalah sebuah sistem tarif preferensial yang membolehkan satu negara secara resmi memberikan pengecualian terhadap aturan umum Organisasi Perdagangan Dunia (WTO). Singkatnya melalui GSP, satu negara bisa memberi keringanan tarif bea masuk kepada eksportir dari negara-negara tertentu, dalam hal ini AS terhadap Indonesia.Airlangga mengungkapkan negosiasi GSP antara Indonesia dengan AS sudah mencapai 80 persen dan ada beberapa syarat yang masih dalam perundingan lebih lanjut. Antara lain mengenai kebijakan Bank Indonesia (BI) soal Gerbang Pembayaran Nasional (GPN).Pada aturan GPN, BI mewajibkan seluruh transaksi pembayaran di Indonesia diproses oleh perusahaan switching di dalam negeri. Padahal sebelumnya, proses switching bisa dilakukan oleh Visa dan Mastercard. Keduanya merupakan perusahaan switching dan principal kartu asal AS. Lalu, Negeri Paman Sam juga meminta pelonggaran atas kewajiban perusahaan swasta mengenai penempatan pusat data (data center) di dalam negeri.Tidak hanya itu, dalam pertemuan antara Jokowi dengan Wilbur Ross juga disepakati mengenai peningkatan perdagangan kedua negara menjadi US$ 60 miliar dari yang saat ini US$ 30 miliar, proses itu dilakukan selama lima tahun ke depan.Airlangga mengatakan akan ada peluang penambahan komoditas yang akan mendapatkan GSP seperti furnitur dan tekstil. Hanya saja, hal itu baru bisa dinegosiasikan setelah pembahasan usulan GSP tahun ini selesai."Wilbur Ross mengatakan apabila GSP nya selesai, kita bisa bicara mengenai tambahan-tambahan yang bisa didorong," ungkap dia. RI Will Visit the US Again to Discuss Trade Incentives Settlement
06 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Hendra Kusuma


Foreign Minister Retno LP Marsudi Photo: Andhika Prasetia / detikcom

Jakarta - The government said that discussions on the affairs of the Generalized System of Preferences (GSP) on Indonesia's trade with the United States (US) will be completed by the end of December 2019. Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi said the Indonesian GSP negotiating team would visit the US in early December this year. This was also the result of a meeting between US Trade Minister Wilbur Ross and President Jokowi. "We also talked about the issue of GSP facilitation, this is a problem that has long been discussed and there was already an agreement that maybe in early December we will send a team to negotiate, to completed, "Retno said at the Presidential Palace complex, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). During the meeting, Retno considered that Ross gave a signal that the completion of the GSP proposal would be completed in a way that would benefit both parties." From what was conveyed by the Secretary Ross we are optimistic that the issues related to the GSP facility will be resolved well, with a win-win, "he said. Meanwhile, the Coordinating Minister for the Economy Darmin Nasution revealed that the completion of the GSP proposal negotiations will occur at Christmas in 2019." finalize the item, we just send our delegation and later we will send it in December, so it can be completed "before Christmas," explained Airlangga. The GSP is a preferential tariff system that allows one country to formally make exceptions to the general rules of the World Trade Organization (WTO). In short, through the GSP, one country can provide import duty tariff relief to exporters from certain countries, in this case the US to Indonesia. Nonmen revealed that the GSP negotiations between Indonesia and the US had reached 80 percent and there were several conditions that were still in further negotiations. Among others, regarding Bank Indonesia (BI) policy on the National Payment Gate (GPN). In the GPN regulation, BI requires that all payment transactions in Indonesia be processed by domestic switching companies. Whereas before, the switching process could be done by Visa and Mastercard. Both are switching companies and US card principals. Then, Uncle Sam's Country also asked for easing of the obligations of private companies regarding the placement of data centers (data centers) in the country. Not only that, in a meeting between Jokowi with Wilbur Ross also agreed on increasing trade between the two countries to US $ 60 billion from the current this is US $ 30 billion, the process is carried out over the next five years. Nonprofit said there would be an opportunity to add commodities that would get GSPs such as furniture and textiles. However, this can only be negotiated after the discussion of the proposed GSP this year is complete. "Wilbur Ross said if the GSP is completed, we can talk about additions that can be encouraged," he said.
